replies.body:
You are the biggest troll on the eSports forum! 

I understand the Bjergsen over Link
I understand rush hour over WildBoys.
But Zion over Dyrus?!?! 


I believe your team concept would fall over. Too many play makers and not enough supporting characters.

Literally every role you picked is a "carry" role on their team.  Nothing to assist them in carrying.  No real contributing assistance. Dyrus isn't a carry, but he's constant and can keep his team alive. Xsmithe isn't a carry jungle force-feeding kills to the carries, but he counter ganks and gets Zion going.

You can't have a team of full carries and expect it to have any affect in competitive.

Too much hate for zionspartan here. But Santorin isn't that much of a playmaker so I guess the comp, alongside with good synergy between the solo laners, could pay off here. Indeed a supportive top laner such as dyrone could work wonders.
Zion is pretty good, don't get me wrong. He just won't work in a line up like this. And his teamfighting weakness could really hurt him.
I won't get you wrong... I will only get my runes wrong, you are totally right :D

Dyrus would be better than Zion in this line up, all  lanes are carries and there won't be enough gold on the map to satisfy them. Go look at how bad strategically OMG is with Uzi lol. Not to mention Zion can't teamfight at all.
